subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Another tuner--It's a Sony!
author: Mvanah Maloti
full_text:
--0-1687244076-1291142131=:55059
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Frank, 
=C2=A0
Please don't. 
=C2=A0
I know that you probably hear it all t=
he time (I hope you do, at least) and that it's hard to stomach...but your =
work=C2=A0IS great, it has immense value, helped transform an entire field =
of research and opened up the doors wide to future experimentation, expandi=
ng knowledge=C2=A0and various=C2=A0personal (psycho-spiritual-technological=
)=C2=A0advances. 
=C2=A0
Your continued questioning is a good thing and I c=
ertainly applaud your efforts used=C2=A0to gain a deeper understanding into=
 what we do, how it works and just what the hell is going on here. 
=C2=A0
=
It's my personal feeling that "psychic-prop" is a spot on term for such thi=
ngs. In reality, I believe most who conduct GBC can/could communicate witho=
ut such devices. It becomes a matter of training, experience and preference=
. Working with the GB has allowed my own intuitive, clairvoyant, clairaudie=
nt and clairsentient gifts to become more fully developed and that's not to=
 mention=C2=A0the immense joy I and others have=C2=A0gained through this wo=
rk and it=C2=A0is, in a very large way,=C2=A0because of YOU my friend. 
=C2=
=A0
I've been feeling more and more lately that GBC does indeed happen, for=
 the most part, in the user's brain. I believe that our unconscious self an=
d subconscious mind has things it wishes to communicate to us at a consciou=
s level. 
=C2=A0
With the box we get a never-ending supply of raw audio tha=
t our minds can use to "realize" (perceive) things that only makes sense to=
 us, the individual operating the device and GB sessions. I think that what=
 we find, hear and become receptive to during our sessions...all that we "p=
ick out" of a recording are things the unconscious self wishes to make know=
n to the conscious self. 
=C2=A0
The audio matrixing principle, phonologica=
l ambiguities and auditory un-clarities resulting doesn't take anything awa=
y from the information and messages which come through. We hear the parts, =
pieces and patterns that we're supposed to. The voices, messages and inform=
ation that each of us is drawn to is, in some way, exactly what the subcons=
cious mind wishes to communicate to us and we hear it just as we're suppose=
d to. 
=C2=A0
Some people might perceive these messages=C2=A0as originating=
=C2=A0from spirit or ET's or "The Great Field"...whatever it is and by whic=
hever name seems to "fit" and make the most sense to the individual. 
=C2=
=A0
I think in many ways that we are ALL right!
=C2=A0
If all there is IS "=
mind", thought, consciousness, light, energy and endless fields of pure inf=
ormation...if everything is connected by one quantum field, one Source of e=
nergy and one point of origin (The Big Bang, Intelligent Design, Divine Hap=
penstance, a total fluke=C2=A0or whatever the case may be!) then I'm far le=
d to believe that our minds are connected to ALL of it and will continue to=
 use whatever methods, mediums and forms are at our disposal to assist with=
 that communication. 
=C2=A0
What you've said here doesn't invalidate anyth=
ing for me, personally. If anything your insights and frustrations make it =
more relevant...I just wish it wasn't all so taxing on you, Frank. 
=C2=A0
=
-Jerome


--- On Tue, 11/30/10, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> =
wrote:


From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...>
Subject: Re: [EVP=
-ITC] Another tuner--It's a Sony!
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, RTSC@yahoogr=
oups.com
Date: Tuesday, November 30, 2010, 10:23 AM


=C2=A0 




=C2=A0Oka=
y then, this makes me step back and ask WTF? I think hear something, post w=
hat=C2=A0I thought I heard, then listen the next day, and it's nothing but =
broadcast frags. In #6 now "frank's ol' lady---wormwood...", and 8, "he's g=
ot a good idea...." Ya have to be able to ask, what if it is all just brain=
? If no one in the world hears the same sutff, is it valid? and who thinks =
their hearing is so much more superior to anyone else's that they can tell =
what it really says. So far, these other experts seem=C2=A0to hear only fra=
gs.=C2=A0 All I can figure is that we get enough to show others, and oursel=
ves that something is going on, but most of the communication is just using=
 the sounds being used as a psychic prop--in the brain. It does not mean th=
e communication is invalid, or what one hears false. It just means it's mor=
e personal, and not provable. Round and round, till one finally breaks loos=
e, and hits this wall. I find myself questioning this stuff more and
 more.=
=C2=A0 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0I don't know what to think anymore, I came up with thi=
s braindead box idea, and it seems=C2=A0to work for everyone except me.=C2=
=A0I'm thinkin' I wasted my IT career=C2=A0for this crap.=C2=A0=C2=A0
=C2=
=A0
F-S


On Tue, Nov 30, 2010 at 12:00 AM, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl=
@...> wrote:


=C2=A0 


[Attachment(s) from Frank Sumption included =
below] 

=C2=A0Had a Sony AM/FM/Cassette/CD boom box that I got two years a=
go for $3. I made a sweep board for it this afternoon, then found it had a =
seperate tuner board. So I liberated the tuner from the rest, and striped e=
verything else for parts. It make primo box! This runs on six volts and tak=
es a signal wire to change bands. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0#6 starts out "Is Hultay ev=
en---wormwood". #8 is cool "I think that he videos this reciever", after th=
at "the alamo's on ten meter basement(?)" teh 10 meter band is at 28 to=C2=
=A029.5 mhz, it's one of the ham bands. So is basement the bottom if 10 met=
ers, at about 28.5Mhz if I remember right? Now that's a trip, cuz I was swi=
tching between AM and FM.
=C2=A0
F-S
